name: Sky Land - Chapter 1
description:
You play as Sky, and a wizard name Wizzie Da W. Da Wizzard, set quest for you!

From the creators of NathGMG: THE GAME, introducing SKY LAND Chapter 1

HIGH QUALITY point and click game! that's pretty much it... 

Did you know that this game was made in PowerPoint? Pretty Cool right!

The best part is, IT'S FREE! DOWNLOAD IT NOW! 

(AS LONG AS YOU HAVE POWERPOINT INTALLED)

Sky Land - CHAPTER 1 created by Sky Lavadia

THE GAME WAS INSPIRED BY TELLTALE'S WALKING DEAD and RIDDLE SCHOOL
